workflow.name: Automate SaaS operations with GPT-4.1-mini for user, support & billing management
workflow.description:
## HOW IT WORKS :
Automates SaaS operations by consolidating user management, AI-driven support triage, analytics, and billing into one unified system. User signups flow through registration, support requests route via OpenAI prioritization, billing events trigger confirmations, and daily analytics feed dashboards. The AI Business Logic layer orchestrates real-time decisions, enriches data, and triggers Gmail notifications. Four data streams converge into centralized routing for customer onboarding, ticket triage, metrics aggregation, and revenue automation.
 
## SETUP STEPS:
1. Add OpenAI API credentials for chat model routing
2. Authenticate Gmail with app password for notifications
3. Connect Data Table Tool for user/support/billing storage
4. Configure workflow settings: priority thresholds and routing rules
5. Test each branch with sample data to verify all integrations

## PREREQUISITES:
OpenAI API key, Gmail account with app password, MCP Server access, Data Table Tool credentials 

## USE CASES:
Manage SaaS customer lifecycle end-to-end; Route critical support instantly 
 
## CUSTOMIZATION:
Extend AI prompts for different support categories; add Slack/Teams notifications 
 
## BENEFITS:
Reduces manual overhead 70%, routes tickets 10x faster, centralizes customer data

workflow.name: GPT 4.1-mini-SaaS for Unified User, Support & Billing Management

parameters.formDescription: Create your account to get started

parameters.text: ={{ $json.fullName }} signed up for {{ $json.planType }} plan. Email: {{ $json.email }}. Company: {{ $json.companyName }}

options.systemMessage:
You are an AI business logic orchestrator for a Micro-SaaS platform.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze new user sign-ups and determine appropriate onboarding actions
2. Use the Data Table Tool to log user activity and analytics
3. Use the Gmail Tool to send personalized welcome emails to new users
4. Track user engagement metrics in the analytics table
5. Return a structured summary of actions taken

Always be proactive in creating a great user experience.

parameters.toolDescription: Manage user data including sign-ups, profiles, and account status
Track user activity, engagement metrics, and usage statistics

options.systemMessage:
You are an AI support triage agent for a Micro-SaaS platform.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze incoming support requests
2. Categorize the issue type (technical, billing, feature request, general inquiry)
3. Assess priority level (high, medium, low) based on urgency and impact
4. Determine if immediate admin attention is required
5. Generate an appropriate auto-response for the user
6. Return structured triage results

Priority Guidelines:
- High: Service outages, billing errors, security issues, data loss
- Medium: Feature bugs, account access issues, integration problems
- Low: Feature requests, general questions, documentation inquiries

## HOW IT WORKS :
Automates SaaS operations by consolidating user management, AI-driven support triage, analytics, and billing into one unified system. The AI Business Logic layer orchestrates real-time decisions, enriches data, and triggers Gmail notifications. ## Billing Automation
**What:** Billing events trigger processing â†’ updates user status â†’ sends confirmations
**Why:** Streamlines revenue ops, maintains accuracy, improves customer communication

## Analytics
**What:** Daily schedule fetches analytics â†’ aggregates metrics â†’ generates dashboards
**Why:** Real-time business visibility, KPI tracking, data-driven decisions

## Support Triage
**What:** Receives requests â†’ OpenAI model prioritizes â†’ routes high-priority to Gmail
**Why:** Intelligent categorization reduces manual work, ensures urgent issues get instant attention

## User Onboarding
**What:** Form captures signups â†’ stores in tables â†’ MCP tools manage records
**Why:** Automates account creation, ensures data consistency, enables customer tracking

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
